---
title: "Overview"
---

## High-level description
This file contains a collection of functions that generate different examples of Clinical Document Architecture (CDA) XML structures. These functions are primarily used for testing purposes, providing various CDA document structures with different content types and encodings.

## Symbols

### `getCdaWithEmptyNonXmlBody()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with an empty `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tag.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with an empty `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tag |

### `getCdaWithTwoNonXmlBodyTags()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string containing two `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tags, one with encoded TIFF image data and another with an empty text tag.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with two `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tags |

### `getCdaWithTwoTextTagsUnderNonXmlBodyTag()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with a single `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tag containing two `&lt;text&gt;` tags, one with encoded TIFF image data and another empty.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with two `&lt;text&gt;` tags under a single `&lt;nonXMLBody&gt;` tag |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedText()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded plain text content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded plain text |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedPdf()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded PDF content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded PDF content |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedTiff()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded TIFF image content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded TIFF image content |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedPng()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded PNG image content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded PNG image content |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedJpeg()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded JPEG image content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded JPEG image content |

### `getCdaWithB64EncodedOctet()`
#### Description
This function returns a CDA XML string with Base64 encoded octet-stream content.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A CDA XML string with Base64 encoded octet-stream content |

### `getEncodedTiff()`
#### Description
This private function returns a Base64 encoded string representing a TIFF image.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| return value | string | A Base64 encoded string of a TIFF image |

## References
The functions in this file reference the `getEncodedTiff()` function to include TIFF image data in some of the CDA examples.
